testcase.name: Login to application and update the first name
testcase.system-out: Given User click on Sign in on index page...................................passed When Login to the application with valid credentials........................passed Then User should be logged in...............................................passed Given Navigate to Personal Information on My account page...................passed When Save the form after updating the first name............................passed Then Success message "Your personal information has been successfully updated." should be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Buy a T-Shirt and validate on order history page
testcase.system-out: Given User click on Sign in on index page...................................passed When Login to the application with valid credentials........................passed Then User should be logged in...............................................passed Given User navigates to "T-Shirts" section and start purchasing the first item.passed When User completes the purchase............................................passed And User navigate back to orders after confirming the order on Payment page.passed Then Verify that Order is displayed in order history page...................passed
